caption: www.youtube.com
description: BBC Four doc about easy listening music. (6 parts long, make sure you click the next part to continue.)
message: Interesting documentary on easy listening music. I have a soft spot for easy listening and lounge music. Its irony-free and relentlessly upbeat sound is an antidote to angst, melancholy, and bitterness. I find a lot of easy listening/adult contemporary from the 70s-80s truly is weak and empty. But, when done well, it is lush, refreshing, and strong rather than boring, bankrupt, and weak. (I also find original non-voc
name: The Joy of Easy Listening
